Premium Quality HDMI Cable: This HDMI cable has 30WG copper wire, triple tin shielded in a double braided premium nylon with gold plated corrosion resistant connectors for guaranteed top tier image & sound
Full Compatibility: Ultra high speed 4K HDMI cable supports 18Gbps transfer and is backwards compatible with earlier versions of HDMI cable (1.3/1.4/2.0/2.0a) NOT for 8K

Universal HDMI Cable: Works with all of your HDMI devices. Compatible with Blu-ray players, Fire TV, Apple TV, PS5, PS4, XBox One, Nintendo Switch, computer, laptop, monitor, projector and more. An essential HDMI cable for all of your home & office devices

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: What is 4K Ultra HD? Powerbear Ultra high speed 4K HDMI cable supports 18Gbps transfer and is backwards compatible with earlier versions of HDMI cable (1.3/1.4/2.0/2.0a). Is this HDMI cable applicable on low-resolution (e.g 1080p) screen? Yes, no matter what you connect to if with HDMI Port. Does this this cable support hdcp 2.2? Yes. Powerbear HDMI cable supports the hdcp 2.2 4K standard. If you plug this cable into an hdmi 2.0 port with hdcp 2.2 it will work. Will this cable work for a Samsung or Roku TV? Yes, our cable is universal compatible! Does this cable support HDR? Yes. Powerbear Ultra HD 4K HDMI cable brings crisper images while High Dynamic Range (HDR) delivers brighter, more realistic colors and greater detail.

The PowerBear 4k HDMI Cable The PowerBear HDMI cable boosts 4K resolution at 60 Hz, along with compatibility with 2K and 1080P resolutions. The gold plated connectors provide high speed bandwidth for amazing video and sound quality. Braided nylon keeps your cables safe along with giving them extended longevity. Fully compatible with any HDMI device like Blu-Ray players, game consoles, Fire TV, Apple TV, computers, projectors, and more. Watch or play anywhere!

Previous page Double Braided Nylon The double braided nylon provides incredible strength. Never worry about abrasions, tears or shocks! High Speed Data With the gold plated connectors enjoy unparalleled video quality with up to 18 Gbs of bandwidth. Resolution up to 4K Enjoy video in 1080P, 2K, or 4K with crisp HDR color depth. (Previous versions compatible) Next page 1 Double Braided Nylon 2 High Speed Data 3 4K Resolution

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Reliable and High-Quality HDMI Cable
reviews.reviewText: The PowerBear 4K HDMI Cable has been a great addition to my entertainment setup. The 10 ft length offers excellent flexibility without compromising on quality. The braided nylon and gold connectors not only look premium but also ensure durability and a secure connection. Streaming content in 4K is a breeze with this cable - the picture quality is sharp, and there's no lag or signal loss. It's compatible with various devices, and I've experienced consistent performance across different setups. Overall, a reliable, high-speed HDMI cable that delivers on its promise of top-notch visuals without any hassle. Highly satisfied with its performance!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The PowerBear 4K HDMI Cable has proven to be a reliable and high-quality addition to my entertainment setup. The 10 ft length provides flexibility in connecting various devices. The braided nylon and gold connectors ensure durability and a secure connection. The 4K @ 60Hz capability delivers crystal-clear picture quality, making it ideal for my PS5, PS4, and other devices. The inclusion of ARC (Audio Return Channel) is convenient for streamlined audio setups. The CL3 rating adds versatility for in-wall installations. If you're in need of a dependable HDMI cable for your high-resolution devices, the PowerBear 4K HDMI Cable is an excellent choice for its performance and durability.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceptional 4K HDMI Cables for Church Laptops and Monitors!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the PowerBear 4K HDMI Cable 10 ft for our church laptops, and I must say, these cables have exceeded my expectations in every aspect! They have proven the perfect solution for establishing reliable connections between our laptops and monitors over longer distances.First and foremost, the performance of these HDMI cables is outstanding. The high-speed capabilities, including 4K @ 60Hz support, Ultra HD, 2K, and 1080P resolutions, ensure crisp and vibrant display quality. The visual output is sharp and detailed, enhancing the clarity of presentations and media content during church services.The build quality of these cables is impressive. The braided nylon exterior provides excellent durability and protection against wear and tear, making them perfect for regular use in our church setting. The gold-plated connectors offer a secure and stable connection, minimizing signal loss and ensuring reliable transmission of audio and video signals.One notable feature of these cables is their ARC (Audio Return Channel) support, which enables audio transfer from our monitors back to the laptops. This feature proves invaluable during multimedia presentations or when utilizing sound systems connected to laptops.The CL3 rating is another advantage, indicating that these cables are safe for in-wall installations. This feature ensures compliance with building codes and regulations, making them suitable for various setups in our church venue.Regarding compatibility, the PowerBear 4K HDMI cables work seamlessly with our church laptops and monitors. We experienced no compatibility issues or signal drops, providing peace of mind during our services and presentations.Lastly, the 10 ft length of these cables is perfect for our needs, allowing for flexible positioning of laptops and monitors without any restrictions or limitations.Overall, I highly recommend the PowerBear 4K HDMI Cable 10 ft for anyone needing reliable, high-quality HDMI connections, especially for church laptops and monitors. These cables deliver exceptional performance, durability, and compatibility, ensuring an excellent visual and audio experience during services and presentations. I am delighted with my purchase; these cables have become invaluable to our church setup!

reviews.reviewerName: Jersey Girl now in AZJersey Girl now in AZ
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does the job very well, even at this length
reviews.reviewText: I use this to display from my laptop onto the living room tv and despite the 40' length it gives me a great quality connection, even when I am showing a movie from a streaming service. I have been using this for well over a year now a never a trace of noise in the signal. A 15' cable would reach from the TV to where I use the laptop but run across the middle of the room. I tried 30 and 35' cables but they were not quite long enough for where I wanted to route the cable. This 40' cable reaches from the back of the TV, laying snug against the wall out of the way of foot traffic and the vacuum, reaching around the tv stand, past other furniture, behind the couch and coming out from under an end table to exactly where I use the laptop. When I'm not connecting the laptop, I keep the end of the cable coiled neatly and tucked just under the end table (with a dust cover over the end), so I can easily grab the end and connect it. I have other cables in other lengths, from this seller, and they all perform well.

reviews.reviewText: Upgraded my tv to 4k and had to replace the HDMI that came with the PS5 console. Huge difference between regular and 4k HDMI. Best purchase, no issue, and great bang for your wallet!

Upgrade your setup and elevate your audiovisual experience with this exceptional cable.
